dev.jeka.core.tool

Class JkCommands

  • java.lang.Object
    • dev.jeka.core.tool.JkCommands

  • public class JkCommands
extends java.lang.Object
    Base class for defining commands executable from command line.

    • Constructor Detail

      • JkCommands

        protected JkCommands()
        Constructs a JkCommands. Using constructor alone won't give you an instance populated with runtime options neither decorated with plugins.
        Use of(Class) to get instances populated with options and decorated with plugins.

    • Method Detail

      • of

        public static <T extends JkCommands> T of(java.lang.Class<T> commandClass)
        Creates a instance of the specified command class (extending JkCommands), including option injection, plugin loading and plugin activation.

      • setup

        protected void setup()
        This method is invoked right after options has been injected into this instance. Here, You will typically configure plugins before they are activated.

      • setupAfterPluginActivations

        protected void setupAfterPluginActivations()
        This method is called once all plugin has been activated. This method is intended to overwrite what plugin activation has setup.

      • getBaseTree

        public final JkPathTree getBaseTree()
        Returns the base directory tree for this project. All file/directory path are resolved to this directory. Short-hand for JkPathTree.of(baseDir).

      • getBaseDir

        public final java.nio.file.Path getBaseDir()
        Returns the base directory for this project.

      • getOutputDir

        public java.nio.file.Path getOutputDir()
        Returns the output directory where all the final and intermediate artifacts are generated.

      • getPlugins

        public JkRunPlugins getPlugins()
        Returns the container of loaded plugins for this instance.

      • getPlugin

        public <T extends JkPlugin> T getPlugin(java.lang.Class<T> pluginClass)
        Shorthand to getPlugins().get(). Returns the plugin instance of the specified class loaded in the holding JkCommands instance. If it does not hold a plugin of the specified class at call time, the plugin is loaded then returned.

      • getDefDependencyResolver

        public final JkDependencyResolver getDefDependencyResolver()
        Returns the dependency resolver used to compile/run scripts of this project.

      • getDefDependencies

        public final JkDependencySet getDefDependencies()
        Dependencies necessary to compile the this command class. It is not the dependencies for building the project.

      • getImportedCommands

        public final JkImportedCommands getImportedCommands()
        Returns imported runs with plugins applied on.

      • clean

        public void clean()
        Cleans the output directory.

      • help

        public void help()
        Displays all available methods defined in this run.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
